description: Founders of London based architecture and design studio Archmongers, take We Design Homes through a journey of recent projects and discuss how they use beautiful, hardwearing, and timeless materials to create functional, yet playful, homes.

factsheet.heading: Thoughtful homes series
paragraphs: Open House Festival is a two-week celebration of London’s housing, architecture, and neighbourhoods. As part of this year’s festival, We Design Homes invites you to join us in a series of online talks with some of the UK’s leading design-led architects, as they take us through a journey of recent projects whilst discussing what it takes to create some of London's most exceptionally thoughtful homes.

factsheet.heading: Archmongers
paragraphs: Margaret and Johan, founders of London based architecture and design studio Archmongers, take us through a journey of their most recent London projects and discuss how they use beautiful, hardwearing, and timeless materials to create functional, yet playful, homes. The practice is renowned for specialising in the sensitive refurbishment of mid-century homes and takes great pride in solving clients’ needs by focusing on the context of each space and the people that occupy it.

name: Creating thoughtful homes with Archmongers
